name: Better Not Cry (Christmas Giveaway)
description:
Better Not Cry is a small game made by NielsDev where the players have to fight the evil snowmen and save Christmas from being ruined!

Santa needs your help from the invading Snowmen. Fight as many snowmen as you and explore the little town and uncover its secrets.

As you explore the world and fight Evil Snowmen, you'll find hidden codes which can be traded in for a free copy of the game Temple Hunters as part of a Giveaway which is being held by NielsDev this Christmas. Happy holidays and have fun playing with everyone! Join our Discord to redeem the key! 

For every 50 wishlists on Steam or generous donation, we'll add 1 more hidden Temple Hunters Steam key into the game and update the map with a new area to explore :)

Wishlist Temple Hunters on Steam!
